name: EMPLOYEE OF THE DTP (demo)
description: PLEASE READ THE DESCRIPTION SO YOU GET THE STORY. You are a test subject of  D.T.P Dimensional Traveling Project. You are put in a room with several portals. Each portal show's the same room but in a different dimension wich means that something is different and the room can have a different purpose. Test subject 435 entered his first portal at 15:41 in 5th of June 2064. He seemed to be in IKEA but everything was 10 times larger than anything in our dimension. Test subject 848 entered his first portal at 4:13 in 26th of May 2064. He entered a 2d dimension but got into a high stress and collapsed but was never seen again. But if you manage to survive and find a way home. You can go home or work with the D.T.P with 68 000 dolars per month. I know some of you would not read the story so some of you will get confused. If i wrote anything wrong please tell me because im from czech republic
